languages.text: {n}{petname} возвращается через час. Прежде чем опуститься на свой насест, ворон бросает вам под ноги свою добычу — послушный вашему приказу, он действительно нашел и принес дар свое{mf|му|й} хозя{mf|ину|йке}.{/n}

{n}{petname} returns after a watch hour has passed. Before landing back on the perch, the raven drops its trophy at your feet — following your command, it has indeed found something to offer its master.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}{petname} возвращается через час. Прежде чем опуститься на свой насест, ворон бросает вам под ноги свою добычу — послушный вашему приказу, он действительно нашел и принес дар свое{mf|му|й} хозя{mf|ину|йке}.{/n}

languages.text: {n}{petname}は見張りの交代時間が過ぎた後に戻ってきた。止まり木に戻る前に、レイヴンは足元に戦利品を落とした。あなたのコマンドに従い、確かに主人に捧げるべき何かを見つけてきたのだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}{petname} returns after a watch hour has passed. Before landing back on the perch, the raven drops its trophy at your feet — following your command, it has indeed found something to offer its master.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}{petname}は見張りの交代時間が過ぎた後に戻ってきた。止まり木に戻る前に、レイヴンは足元に戦利品を落とした。あなたのコマンドに従い、確かに主人に捧げるべき何かを見つけてきたのだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Nach einer Stunden Wache kehrt {petname} zurück. Bevor er wieder auf seiner Sitzstange landet, lässt der Rabe eine Trophäe vor deinen Füßen fallen – deinem Befehl entsprechend hat er tatsächlich etwas gefunden, das er {mf|seinem Herren|seiner Herrin} anbietet.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}{petname} returns after a watch hour has passed. Before landing back on the perch, the raven drops its trophy at your feet — following your command, it has indeed found something to offer its master.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Nach einer Stunden Wache kehrt {petname} zurück. Bevor er wieder auf seiner Sitzstange landet, lässt der Rabe eine Trophäe vor deinen Füßen fallen – deinem Befehl entsprechend hat er tatsächlich etwas gefunden, das er {mf|seinem Herren|seiner Herrin} anbietet.{/n}

languages.text: {n}{petname} revient au bout d'une heure de quart. Avant de se poser sur son perchoir, la corneille laisse tomber un trophée à vos pieds. Obéissant à vos ordres, elle a rapporté une offrande.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}{petname} returns after a watch hour has passed. Before landing back on the perch, the raven drops its trophy at your feet — following your command, it has indeed found something to offer its master.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}{petname} revient au bout d'une heure de quart. Avant de se poser sur son perchoir, la corneille laisse tomber un trophée à vos pieds. Obéissant à vos ordres, elle a rapporté une offrande.{/n}

languages.text: {n}{petname} regresa al cabo de una hora de guardia. Antes de volver a posarse sobre su percha, el cuervo suelta su trofeo a tus pies; tal y como le habías ordenado, ha encontrado algo de utilidad para su {mf|amo|ama}.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}{petname} returns after a watch hour has passed. Before landing back on the perch, the raven drops its trophy at your feet — following your command, it has indeed found something to offer its master.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}{petname} regresa al cabo de una hora de guardia. Antes de volver a posarse sobre su percha, el cuervo suelta su trofeo a tus pies; tal y como le habías ordenado, ha encontrado algo de utilidad para su {mf|amo|ama}.{/n}

languages.text: {n}一个小时之后，{petname}回来了，将它找到的战利品丢在了你的脚下。它忠实地执行了你的命令，为它的主人找来了些东西。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}{petname} returns after a watch hour has passed. Before landing back on the perch, the raven drops its trophy at your feet — following your command, it has indeed found something to offer its master.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}一个小时之后，{petname}回来了，将它找到的战利品丢在了你的脚下。它忠实地执行了你的命令，为它的主人找来了些东西。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Bir saatin ardından {petname} geri dönüyor. Tüneğine tekrar oturmadan önce ayaklarının dibine bulduğu ganimeti bırakıyor. Anlaşılan emrine uymuş ve sana bir şey getirmiş.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}{petname} returns after a watch hour has passed. Before landing back on the perch, the raven drops its trophy at your feet — following your command, it has indeed found something to offer its master.{/n}
